jobDescription: Do you like interacting with customers, and meeting them face to face?Are you someone who loves problem solving? Senior Accounts Executives (Senior AEs) are empowered to grow and improve customer relationships with FusionStorm. Senior AEs seek opportunities within their current customer base or can benefit from the many marketing activities sponsored by FusionStorm. Travel to client sites is required - FusionStorm Principal AEs work from a local FusionStorm office and engage face-to-face with customers through a consultative sales approach to develop business plans to satisfy the particular needs of the customer. You need a consistent track record of sales achievement, a high level of integrity, as well as excellent communication and presentation skills. Additional competencies include strong communication and listening skills, the capability to settle, with the assistance of our extensive technical resources, the correct solutions, and then present and close these solutions.
